Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-0727 affecting package hvloader for versions less than 1.0.1-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-0727 affecting package hvloader for versions less than 1.0.1-3. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package hvloader is earlier than 1.0.1-3, affected by CVE-2024-0727
